name: Fighter HUD on Camera
description:
High fidelity fighter HUD on your phone camera with American, European, Russian and Civilian layouts:

Sensors calculate and show data as:

* Artificial Horizon, Pitch, Roll and Bank angles

* Compass Heading

* Current vertical G-Force and maximum G-Force

* Altitude and Speed

* Night vision effect and Sounds

* Professional version with support for Gyroscope for extra precision
